effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
